description: We believe,life is all about LIVING and DOING what gives you HAPPINESS..!!DO IT BIG,DO IT RIGHT

portfolio.name: 3ctech ( Chitkara Consortium of Computer Technocrats ) is the main technical club of Chitkara University that handles all the technical activities and events being carried out in the university. Its a great opportunity for all the budding engineers to explore themselves to a great extent. Mission is To help students become technically strong and make them learn the needs of the industry
